prop.name: numberedPosition
prop.desc: A number associated with a role in an organization, for example, the number on an athlete's jersey.

Role.name: endDate
Role.desc: The end date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

Role.name: namedPosition
Role.desc: A position played, performed or filled by a person or organization, as part of an organization. For example, an athlete in a SportsTeam might play in the position named 'Quarterback'.

Role.name: startDate
Role.desc: The start date and time of the item (in ISO 8601 date format).

Role.name: roleName
Role.desc: A role played, performed or filled by a person or organization. For example, the team of creators for a comic book might fill the roles named 'inker', 'penciller', and 'letterer'; or an athlete in a SportsTeam might play in the position named 'Quarterback'.
